title: Seeing as H&S is being spammed...
body: I updated my client with the new patch and now when I attempt to open it, nothing happens. :s

replies.body:
Posts on H and S will still be seen. We are mass deleting the spam when we have the time for boards at the moment which leaves all the other posts where they should be :) It's an ongoing issue but we're working on a more permanent fix.

(Can't help with your issue sorry but figured I'd update you on the spam)
Ive got the same man, but i hadn't updated yet.... just sitting here waiting for it to be all good again
This was happening to me what I did was hit ctrl + alt + delete > start task manager > processes > then delete LeagueClient.exe. Hope this helps :))
